title: The Meaning of The Illustrious Quran
description: The English translation with Introduction for each Surah (part) of the Qur'an. This edition does not include the Arabic text and translator's commentary and notes. The whole presentation is perfect and superior to any that has appeared hitherto. The purity and the rhythm of the language and masterly exposition of the fundamental problems of human destiny are the salient features of this monumental work.
author: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
